description.plain: American country music singer. American Idol Contestant- Finished third on 16th Season

body.plain: American country music singer. American Idol Contestant- Finished third on 16th Season

songs.title: I Hope

description.plain:
“I Hope” is a song co-written and recorded by American country music singer Gabby Barrett. She released the single independently following her third-place finish on season 16 of American Idol. The song led to her signing a record deal with Warner Music Nashville, and it was officially released in July of 2019 as her debut and lead single from her debut studio album, Goldmine.  A remix featuring pop singer Charlie Puth was released on April 17, 2020.

Lyrically, the song is about wishing for an ex to fall in love only to be cheated on as karma for cheating themselves.

The song received a Country Music Association Award for Single of the Year nomination at the 54th Annual CMA Awards.

songs.embed_content: Read “I Hope” by Gabby Barrett on Genius

The song led to her signing a record deal with Warner Music Nashville, and it was officially released in July of 2019 as her debut and lead single from her debut studio album, Goldmine.  A remix featuring pop singer Charlie Puth was released on April 17, 2020.

Lyrically, the song is about wishing for an ex to fall in love only to be cheated on as karma for cheating themselves.

The song received a Country Music Association Award for Single of the Year nomination at the 54th Annual CMA Awards.

songs.lyrics:
48 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolI Hope Lyrics[Verse 1]
I, I hope she makes you smile
The way you made me smile on the other end of a phone
In the middle of a highway driving alone
Oh baby, I, I hope you hear a song
That makes you sing along and gets you thinking 'bout her
Then the last several miles turn into a blur, yeah

[Chorus]
I hope you're both feelin' sparks by the end of the drive
I hope you know she's the one by the end of the night
I hope you never ever felt more free
Tell your friends that you're so happy
I hope she comes along and wrecks every one of your plans
I hope you spend your last dime to put a rock on her hand
I hope she's wilder than your wildest dreams
She's everything you're ever gonna need
And then I hope she cheats
Like you did on me
And then I hope she cheats
Like you did on me
[Verse 2]
Yeah, babe, I hope she shows up in a 2 AM pic from her friend
Hanging on to a guy and you just ain't him
I hope you stay up all night all alone, waitin' by the phone
And then she calls
And baby, I, I hope you work it out
Forgive and just about forget
And take her on a first date again
And when you lean in for a kiss

[Chorus]
I hope you're both feelin' sparks by the end of the drive
I hope you know she's the one by the end of the night
I hope you never ever felt more free
Tell your friends that you're so happy
I hope she comes along and wrecks every one of your plans
I hope you spend your last dime to put a rock on her hand
I hope she's wilder than your wildest dreams
She's everything you're ever gonna need
And then I hope she cheats
Like you did on me
And then I hope she cheats
Like you did on me

[Bridge]
I hope what goes comes all the way around
I hope she makes you feel the same way about her
That I feel about you right now
You might also like[Chorus]
I hope you're both feelin' sparks by the end of the drive
I hope you know she's the one by the end of the night
I hope you never ever felt more free
Tell your friends that you're so happy
I hope she comes along and wrecks every one of your plans
I hope you spend your last dime to put a rock on her hand
I hope she's wilder than your wildest dreams
She's everything you're ever gonna need
And then I hope she cheats
Like you did on me
And then I hope she cheats
Like you did on me

[Outro]
Like you did on me21Embed

songs.full_title: The Good Ones by Gabby Barrett
songs.title: The Good Ones

description.plain:
When speaking to Taste of Country, Gabby Barrett said that this song is about her fiancé Cade.

When people ask me about Cade, how he’s doing or how we’re doing, I always end up saying, ‘Oh he’s great, he’s a keeper, he’s a good one … That’s where the song came from – appreciating what I’ve got and what he means to me.

This song describes how Barrett got one of the good men in life, he loves her like he should, she says he is good all the time and not just sometimes.

Like the Allegheny runs

And he's proud of where he's from

He's one of the good ones
And he's all mine

[Verse 2]
You'll know him when you see him
By the way he looks at me
You'd say he hung the moon
I'd say he hung the galaxy
Nobody does it better
Oh, the way he pulls me in
I've known a couple bad ones
But they all led me to him

[Pre-Chorus]
He's one of the good ones

[Chorus]

He's one of the good ones

They're out there, minus one

Yeah, I got a good one

[Chorus]

Like he wrote the book one

songs.full_title: I Hope (Remix) by Gabby Barrett (Ft. Charlie Puth)
songs.title: I Hope (Remix)

description.plain:
Charlie Puth hops on this remix of Gabby Barrett’s “I Hope”. The song is about wishing for an ex to fall in love only to be cheated on as karma for cheating themselves. Charlie changes the lyrics to offer the male perspective.

On Amazon Live, Charlie said that even though “I Hope” is a country song and he is a pop singer, he knew he had to jump on the track because he appreciated the lyrics and R&B influences of the song.

songs.embed_content: Read “I Hope (Remix)” by Gabby Barrett on Genius
